DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated numeric value using the subscale scores from the well-being and additional concerns sections of the FACIT-D.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Functional Assessment of Chronic Illness Therapy-Diarrhea Total Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A symptom-specific subscale of the FACIT scales that is used to assess how diarrhea affects an individual's life._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
